g-0: ^Yeah! There's this whirlpool thing, and it, like, pulls people in, and...
^[Irma reads the letter, her eyebrows raising further up along her forehead with each second.]
^I knew they were hiding something! Agh, this whole time!
^I'll have to give them a piece of my mind some other time. I can't believe this!
^Are you... y'know, going to check it out...?
^I know I shouldn't ask you to, but we both need this, right?
g-1: ^I'm already on the case. I haven't found the whirlpool yet, but something tells me it's out there now.
^I'm assuming it's safer without a second passenger onboard, so I'll stay back.
^And honestly, I'm terrified of what you're about to do!
^So just stay safe, yeah? I don't know what I'd do if yet another person went missing.
g-2: ^Don't worry, my boat is so sturdy now, I'm sure I'll be okay!
^Gosh, your confidence is rubbing off on me... I'll be cheering you on from here!
